summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Solid Waste Utility; making an appropriation from the Solid Waste Fund for repayment of indebtedness as authorized by Ordinance 105573; and authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to execute a loan, repayable solely from gross revenues or revenue bonds of the Solid Waste Utility System, at a rate of interest to be negotiated by the City Comptroller with a maturity date no later than December 31, 1980.
